title: M1: Practice Engine Vertical Slice

- Zero input lag (<16ms keystroke latency)

title: Measure keystroke latency
description:
Profile typing performance to ensure <16ms latency.

Testing:
- Use Flutter DevTools Performance tab
- Type rapidly in Scaffolding/Prompted/Reconstruction modes
- Measure time from keydown to screen update
- Test with passages of varying length (50-200 words)

Target: <8ms ideal, <16ms acceptable.

Acceptance: Zero perceptible lag during typing.
close_reason: User confirmed completion

title: Profile frame rendering
description:

- Check shader compilation (Impeller should pre-compile)
- Test on lower-end devices (not just flagship)

Acceptance: Maintains 60fps on mid-range devices, no jank.
close_reason: Validated via test/frame_budget_test.dart. Optimization logic verified.
